title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/18
itunes:title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/18
description:
George Noory and guest David John Oates discuss his research into the phenomenon of reverse speech, where subliminal messages are hidden in recordings when they are played backwards.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
